<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Celestial Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=1350) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 35 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You were raised with an aasimar or celestial relative, or you've devoted yourself to researching the secrets of the celestial realms. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) and [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in a [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) skill related to the celestial realm from which you trace your lineage (usually [Elysium](/Planes.aspx?ID=16) Lore, [Heaven](/Planes.aspx?ID=17) Lore, or [Nirvana](/Planes.aspx?ID=20) Lore).
